name: Simple 2000 Series Vol. 79: Akko ni Omakase! The Party Quiz
summary: The Party Quiz: Akko ni Omakase: This entry in D3's Simple series of budget titles is set up like a television quiz show, with over 1000 questions included. In addition to a couple of single player quiz modes, the game lets up to eight players get together for multiplayer play using the multitap. The game includes four unique types of quizzes.
